Text.Page:
It's not enough to weaken the unseelie. We must take out Sinarl, their so-called regent.

Amline ventured into the Plaza of the Fallen to find Sinarl.

Catch up to her and help her finish the mission.

Arast sent you? Welcome.

Sinarl's nearby, down in the valley actually, but I can't get close. Surrounded by jalmaraks or urisks, no doubt.

You've killed every foe you've come across. Think you're up for an unseelie regent?

Sinarl's death means we can try to reconcile with the rest of the jalmaraks, bring them back to our side. I don't know what possessed them to aid Thulsa in the first place.

You're an incredible soldier, . Thanks!
Sinarl is cautious. He'll have allies to protect him. It's dangerous to go alone. Take others.
